subject: Re: A shipment from order #SSN3690 is on the way
description_text:
Hello!

Just want to ask why the destination country on the tracking number is
Romania and not Greece?


Best Regards
Marios Spanos

conversations.body_text: Hi Marios Spanos,    We apologise, but the base plates are indeed out of stock at our German warehouse. We have dispatched them from an alternative source, so please rest assured. Should any customs duties arise, we shall reimburse you. Here is your logistics tracking link.    https://www.sf-international.com/gb/en/support/querySupport/waybill?No=SF3262300727888

Hello.

In order to understand,

Did you dispatch the pedals from the German warehouse and the baseplate
from another country?

Στις Πέμ 4 Δεκ 2025 στις 1:05 μ.μ., ο/η service@simsonn.com <
service@simsonn.com> έγραψε:

> Hi Marios Spanos,
>
> We apologise, but the base plates are indeed out of stock at our German
> warehouse. We have dispatched them from an alternative source, so please
> rest assured. Should any customs duties arise, we shall reimburse you. Here
> is your logistics tracking link.
>
> https://www.sf-international.com/gb/en/support/querySupport/waybill?No=SF3262300727888
>
> On Mon, 1 Dec at 12:14 PM , Marios Spanos <spanosmarios177@gmail.com>
> wrote:
> Hello!
>
> Just want to ask why the destination country on the tracking number is
> Romania and not Greece?
>
>
> Best Regards
> Marios Spanos
>
>
>
Hi Marios Spanos,    Your parcel is being dispatched from China. We apologise for any confusion this may have caused.
It expect delivery on the 8th. Should any customs duties apply, we shall reimburse you.

8th of December or January 2026?

Στις Πέμ 4 Δεκ 2025 στις 1:46 μ.μ., ο/η service@simsonn.com <
service@simsonn.com> έγραψε:

> It expect delivery on the 8th. Should any customs duties apply, we shall
> reimburse you.
>
> 7187:4206036
>

Let’s hope for both of us not pay additional custom fees.

Best Regards
Marios Spanos


On Thu, 4 Dec 2025 at 13:50, service@simsonn.com
